title: Freezing at the start of the game
body: Everyone keeps saying to disable the game bar and i already did that and also the compatibility, still not working. any more things to try out? =D

replies.body:
You bet! It was a good thought to disable the game bar since it can cause a lot of visual and crash errors. That said, typically the primary suspect for game freezes is actually connection trouble! D:

Even if you don't think your internet is having trouble, run through the steps in [**this guide here**](http://riot.com/12B7oac) for me. Connection troubles can be anything to do with routing or ping to AV's or other programs that might be blocking LoL, so be sure to try all the steps there and test the results in some Custom games to dodge potential afk penalties. Lemme know if it helps you out or not! :)
